Documentation Updates

Below are documentation updates for January-March 2022.

Index of all documentation updates

25-March-2022

New Docs

  • Title: Dolby Atmos Audio
  • Description: Dolby Atmos audio can now be passed through to specific Video Cloud renditions
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/ingest-profiles/guides/dolby-atmos-audio.html
  • Category:
  • Title: OIDC Configuration and Testing for Brightcove Beacon
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to configure your OIDC based identity provider to authenticate Beacon users.
  • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/references/oidc-authentication-for-beacon.html
  • Category:

Major updates

  • Title: CMS API Notifications
  • Description: New master-video-change event allows affiliate accounts to receive notifications when assets of videos shared to them have been modified
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/getting-started/cms-api-notifications.html
  • Category:
  • Title: HEVC Video
  • Description: EAC3 or AC3 audio is now supported for HEVC in Video Cloud
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/ingest-profiles/guides/hevc-video-stage.html#limitations
  • Category:

  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use Video Cloud Studio to create a Live Event with Playback Restrictions.

  • Category:

Major updates

  • Title: CMS API Notifications
  • Description: Two new fields - action and updated_by - added to notifications to indicate the kind of action that was taken and who performed it (if that information is available).
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/getting-started/cms-api-notifications.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Brightcove Live API: Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI)
  • Description: New setting will over ride ad timing compensation, a setting that reduces timing drift when ads that get returned are longer than expected. This is normally achieved by shortening the next ad break. When set to true, all ad break durations will be called as-is, and compensation will not happen.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/ssai/live-api-server-side-ad-insertion-ssai.html#General_information
  • Category:
  • Title: Product Release Notes
  • Description: Individual feature updates now appear in the Page Contents menu, and make it easier to share links to specific updates.
  • Link: https://support.brightcove.com/product-updates.html
  • Category:
